name: Atomic Riders: The Wild Ones
description:
Plot:

Taking place 2 years before the events of Atomic Riders, The Wild Ones chronicles the story of a tense gang warfare that plagues The Barrens, A vicious and unending conflict of turf wars between The Wastelanders and The Mollies, You play as a unlikely hitman from the Wastelanders whom has been chosen to help destabilize the Mollies and bring about the end of the Turf war and ensure a Wastelanders Victory...

This game has 3 endings and a secret ending!
